summary: This mod is designed for those that felt the vanilla guard appearances both too boring and too repetitive. With this mod - and future updates - you should rarely run into the same guard twice, if at all. Added 30+ completely new guard presets to the Stormcloak and Imperial guard leveled lists. Includes female Imperial guards.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][i][b][center][u][size=6]Diverse Guards of Skyrim[/size][/u]
[size=2][color=#ff0000]Now seeking community image uploads, screenshots and description graphics![/color][/size][/center][size=2]
[/size]
[/b][/i][i][b]
[/b][/i][/font][center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][i][b]Chec[/b][/i][i][b]k out my other mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64621/?]Xanvir's Follower Collection[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77203/?]Housecarl Tweaks and Improvements[/url][/b][/i][/size][/font][/center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][i][b]
[/b][/i]

[b][u]Features[/u][/b]

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]Added 80+ completely new guard presets to the Stormcloak and Imperial guard leveled lists.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]Female guards added to the Imperial guard lists. More in the future![/size][/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][u]
[b]Uses Of This Mod

[/b][/u]
This mod is designed for those that felt the vanilla guard appearances both too boring and too repetitive. With this mod - and future updates - you should rarely run into the same guard twice, if at all.

[u][b]Recommended Mods
[/b][/u]
[i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15927/?]Improved Closefaced Helmets[/url] by navida1 - should make all guards' face visible.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8943/?]Diverse Guards Skyrim[/url] by Winterlove - further adds to the variation in guard appearances.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390/?]Guard Dialogue Overhaul[/url] by Eckss - diversifies guard commentary.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9514/?]Open Faced Guard Helmets[/url] by ShinGouki - alternative open faced guard mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81462/?]DIVERSE SKYRIM[/url] by CEMN - Adds even more guards PLUS new NPC looks to a wide variety of leveled enemy lists. Highly recommend. 

[/i][u][b]Compatibility and Known Bugs[/b]
[/u]

So far, there have been no compatibility issues, and this mod should work seamlessly with other mods. If any incompatibilities are found, they will be posted below.

[color=#ff0000][b][i]NO DLC REQUIRED.[/i][/b][/color]

[u][b]Installation/Uninstallation[/b]
[/u]

By the divines, just use the Nexus Mod Manager/Mod Organizer! It's simple to use and works perfectly with this mod. You can try the traditional manual installation method, but I don't recommend it. Although, if the MO/NMM should fail then copy the contents of the files you want to your Skyrim Data folder.
[u][b]
[/b][/u]Uninstall via the NMM/MO, or delete all relevant files related to "Diverse Guards of Skyrim".
[u][b]
Update Installation (Using NMM)[/b]
[/u]

 1) Remove the current version of this mod via NMM/Delete all related files.
 2) Install the new version on this page via NMM/Copy all contents of the files you want to your Data folder.
[u]
[/u]Change Log

[b][u]V.1.0 (12/6/17)[/u][/b]

 -A new total of 83 new guard NPC presets have been added (roughly equal between Imperial and Stormcloak-aligned lists).
-Fixed a bug where some male Stormcloaks were not assigned to the proper factions.

[b][u]V.1.0 (12/6/17)[/u][/b]

 -Initial Release

Thanks for reading! Feel free to comment suggestions. Make sure to endorse this mod if you like the effects![/size][/font]
author: Xanvir
